Denver CO April 2014 to July 2015 Assist in vendor management contract negotiation and license compliance Perform internal asset audits using HP Asset Manager SCCM and DDMI as discovery and CMDB tools software asset management program to ensure legal compliance and increase cost efficiency Responsible for labwide software asset management process and strategy Have ownership for planning and
